body:
Release Notes
    Good news! This release includes new information related to our Data Retention Policy and bug fixes
.

Enhancements

Data Retention Policy
  • This policy is designed to help boost system performance and faster report generation response time to deliver your exports to you faster.
  • Network360 will look at the creation date for all user generated exports (CSV and PDF). Any exports that are over a year old will be automatically removed from the system.
  • When a user clicks on an activity that is over a year old, the user will see a message on the screen notifying them of the Data Retention Policy.

Fixed Issues

Network Names
  • Now, a networkâ€™s name can include special characters (e.g. +) and their analyses will run correctly.
